About The Hobbinomicon

Hobbying from the deep end of the dungeon.

The Hobbinomicon is part journal, part spell book, part hobby blog. I post daily vlogs and cool things I make. Mostly focused on scale modeling, Warhammer, TTRPGs, and wargames.

The Hobbyist

Welcome to my corner of the hobby world! Whether I'm painting tiny warriors, crafting immersive terrain, or rolling dice at the gaming table, I'm always working on something creative.

Through daily vlogs and project showcases, I share the journey of bringing imagination to life—one brushstroke, dice roll, and adventure at a time.

What You'll Find Here

Scale Modeling

Detailed builds and painting techniques for scale models, from military vehicles to sci-fi subjects.

Warhammer

Army builds, painting guides, and battle reports from the grim darkness of the far future and the mortal realms.

TTRPGs

Campaign journals, homebrew content, terrain crafting, and stories from the tabletop.

Wargames

Tactics, strategies, and showcases from various tabletop wargaming systems and historical periods.

Recent Work

Join me in the Dungeon

Join me on YouTube for painting tutorials, hobby vlogs, battle reports, and to follow my journey to become a Golden Daemon winning painter.

Subscribe on YouTube

New videos every day
